remarks: Ordering property of the map defined by ~ df-mapd .  Property (b) of [Baer] p. 40.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jan-2015.)
statement:
mapdord.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdord.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdord.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
mapdord.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdord.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdord.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. S ) $.
mapdord.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. S ) $.
mapdord $p |- ( ph -> ( ( M ` X ) C_ ( M ` Y ) <-> X C_ Y ) ) $.
